<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>false</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:6680d3441ba274108c5143f3cc4bcb39</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill requested for title on platform</name><order>0</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	var onestream = '03fb2d1a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb6a';//Set onestream catalog item sys_id
	
	if(g_form.getUniqueValue() == onestream || g_form.getValue(cat_item) == onestream || g_form.getReference(req_item).cat_item == onestream){//If item is Onestream
		g_form.getReference('requested_for',function(requestedForGr){//Show req for title and set value
			if(requestedForGr.title.toString()){
				g_form.setValue('requested_for_title',requestedForGr.title.toString());
				g_form.setVisible('requested_for_title',true);
				g_form.setReadOnly('requested_for_title',true);
			}
		});
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-31 19:11:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>581a24b51bffc5d08c5143f3cc4bcbf0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill requested for title on platform</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OneStream Access Request" source="x_apig_onestream_a">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OneStream Access Request">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_581a24b51bffc5d08c5143f3cc4bcbf0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-31 19:11:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Requestor Auto Fill Read Only Func">36bf0bc01ba274108c5143f3cc4bcb8b</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
